name: To my forever Love
description:
simple 2D platformer with just jumps and hooks!

(You can't even move)

Features of this game
1. Minimalist visuals and story
2. Extremely simplified controls
3. Abundant gimmicks and a variety of level designs
4. Challenging difficulty and rewarding achievements

High difficulty is achieved through the interaction of stage gimmicks and controls rather than simple control difficulty. To unlock achievements, players must complete the stages in a small number of actions. The fastest time to complete all stages is about 20 minutes, but in general, it takes more than 2 hours.

AMay.
